input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Meadow Heights R-II School District
Go to Meadow Heights R-II School District

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h2:
WELCOME TO THE MEADOW HEIGHTS
R-II SCHOOL

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0.2px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: The regularly scheduled Board Meeting scheduled for Monday, April 13, 2020 has been cancelled due to the COVID-19 shelter in place

span.style: font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0.2px; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0.2px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: . The Meadow Heights R-II School Board will meet next on Monday, May 11, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0.2px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

span.span: FREE lunch/breakfast resource for children 18 and under.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

span.span:
Please complete by 8:30am on the day food is needed.
CLICK HERE for the fillable form or call or text 573-576-9318. Due to Easter Break, the next pickup day is Wednesday, April 15, 2020. We will have curbside pickups and pickup places on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays until Wednesday, May 13.

p.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

strong.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span: Meadow Heights families- I am very shocked at the governor's announcement today. The news that schools must remain closed through the end of the school year makes me very sad. I know everyone has many questions concerning school being closed the rest of the year. I don’t have many answers but I can assure you we will work on getting those answers and get them to you ASAP. We will continue providing enrichment/review packets (electronic and paper), student check-ins, and feeding lunches/breakfasts to our students until the last scheduled day of the 19-20 school year- May 14.

br.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span: Our administrative staff will meet next week to try and figure out answers to the many questions the governor’s order today brought up.

br.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span: We will get through this together. Please take time this Easter weekend to enjoy your break and family.

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span:
Administrative staff will be meeting on Wednesday, April 15 to begin discussions and making decisions concerning the announcement schools must remained closed. We will get that information out to the community as soon as we can.
Donna Bristow

h2.span: Due to COVID-19 all events are cancelled.

div.p: Meadow Heights R-II School does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Meadow Heights R-II School also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
